analysis.description:
CryptoCCIE.startDate (/unique_chucks/31/0x3d5b49261f7ef525a7c548ee1ab6cb8aa00869d2.sol#97) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- fallback (/unique_chucks/31/0x3d5b49261f7ef525a7c548ee1ab6cb8aa00869d2.sol#209-221)
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/31/0x3d5b49261f7ef525a7c548ee1ab6cb8aa00869d2.sol#84) is not in mixedCase
